original_text: He followed the ways of the house of Ahab and did evil in the eyes of the Lord, as the house of Ahab had done, for he was related by marriage to Ahab’s family.
korean_text: 아하시야가 아합의 집 길로 행하여 아합의 집과 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으니 그는 아합의 집의 사위가 되었음이러라

sentences.original_text: He followed the ways of the house of Ahab
and did evil in the eyes of the Lord
as the house of Ahab had done
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아합 가문이 행한 것 같았으며

sentences.original_text: for he was related by marriage to Ahab's family
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아합의 가족과 혼인 관계였기 때문이다
